about_the_game:
Peanut is a small cute corgi with an adventurous attitude. A classically styled 2D platform adventure game with an indie zest with an intriguing storyline.

Peanut comes home to find is BAE gone and a ransom note from the evil Veronica Vet. To thwart his archenemy, he must travel the world and undo what the Vet has done and gain back the love of his life! Along the way he questions the places and characters that he encounters and why BAE was taken from him in the first place.

If you love classic platformers than this should be ideal for a nostalgic thrill spliced with aesthetic levels combined with an intriguing story, some of which requires your interpretation.

45 Levels of game play, with level completion must be carried out before the time limit.
not a puzzle platformer, more a puzzling story platformer or corginoir (but cheerier!).
Level by level you get closer to BAE and closer to the truth.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux or SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Peanut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews:
“We are currently playing the BETA version and are having a lot of fun...The art style is very interesting and we can’t wait to dive into more.”
181 Gaming

“Choose whether you prefer to stomp on enemies or use fireballs to defeat them… but should you kill them with fire, you won’t get any points!”
Gaminglyfe

“Peanut features 45 classic platforming levels, full of nostalgia”
Thumbstix
short_description: A classically styled Corgi 2D platform adventure game with an indie zest with an intriguing storyline. not a puzzle platformer, more a puzzling story platformer or corginoir (but cheerier!). Level by level you get closer to the truth that you perceive.
